description: The proportion of residents of working age (16-64 years) claiming Universal Credit and Job Seekers Allowance.

indicator: Dependent children (0-18 years) in out-of-work households
description: Percentage of children living in households where a parent or guardian claimed out-of-work benefits.
Percentage of those in employment who are in professional occupations.

indicator: Households with no adults in employment with dependent children
description: Percentage of households with no adults in employment and with dependent children aged 15 or under.
